title: Fix far-fetched Boolean ambiguity for byte tensor with one value in it.
body_html:
Testing non-empty tensor in an if statement will unconditionally raise a RuntimeError stating that "bool value of non-empty torch.ByteTensor objects is ambiguous". But when there's only one value, it's bool value is pretty straightforward.
What do you think?
